page.title: 15Stone Works
page.content: Just off the Military Road two and a half miles from Chale Church is the home of Mr.and Mrs.G.R.Short and their family it is called{Compton Fields {Farm.}Originally it was farmland and was owned in the 1930's by the owners of Home Farm and Atherfield Farm.The present owners have their farmyard converted into a{Paving Stone Works.} It is a family business - father and sons.They manufacture and supply {Paving Slabs,Faced Blocks,Screen {Blocks,Walling,Chippings,Ballast,Sand, {Cement,Edgings,Copings.}They also supply{Concrete Mixers,Stone and Slab {Splitters.}A wide range of{stone {ornaments for the garden,a Patio and {Path Laying Service are available. Personal callers are welcome.They are open 8am-5pm Mon-Fri,8am-1pm Sat and 2.30pm-5pm Sun.
